sentence.Network_en: Among the leaders he knew well were Mahatma Gandhi and Jawaharlal Nehru.

sentence.Network_en: Nehru was in a gentle and winning mood.

means.word_mean: 1. Indian statesman and leader with Gandhi in the struggle for home rule; was the first prime minister of the Republic of India from 1947 to 1964 (1889-1964)
